name: Odisea: The Game
description:
We present the very first game in the Urban Music movement. Join us along with Ozuna and uncover the adventure and surprises we have for you!

Odisea is a Game linked with Urban artist of the Year Ozuna and his first album's, Odisea, Release. Challenge yourself to 14 exciting levels along with Ozu, Ozuna's Bear Mascot, and  get the unique opportunity to have a sneak peak of Odisea the Album.

The game is based on the Artist life and his journey through success, each level is filled with fun and adventure. Be sure to achieve the highest score possible to unlock each Star and reveal its secretes like The name of the Tracks or even a preview of the songs in the upcoming Album!

What are you waiting for? Download now and live the complete Odisea Experience!

Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFUwtkZQCrDlZoxyQAcSmIQ
Instagram: https://instagram/odiseathegame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/odiseathegame
